subject: Re: How to create test case to test the Android apk use the JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi David Saff, I don t know. So have to use java classes to read out of an Android apk file at all. (Include the *.java, source, layout...etc files) Then we
messageBody:
Hi David Saff,

I don't know.
So have to use java classes to read out of an Android apk file at all. (Include the *.java, source, layout...etc files)
Then we can create JUnit project to test via this java classes, right?

Regards,
Kent Wang

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> sober60kimo,
>
> Sounds like you have a hard task ahead of you. Do you know whether
> java classes can be read out of an apk file at all?
>
> David Saff
>
> On Wed, Aug 19, 2009 at 8:50 PM, sober60kimo<sober60kimo@...> wrote:
> > Hi,
> >
> > I only have an Anroid apk then want to create JUnit test case to test.
> > How to create test case of JUnit project to test the it?
> > Or can't use in only apk file to test, must have the source code of this file?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> >
> >
> > ------------------------------------
> >
> > Yahoo! Groups Links
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
